items.longDescription:
​- Combines the comfort of a wireless bra with the lifting effect of a wired bra.
- The gorgeous design lifts your mood, flatters your figure, and provides ample support.
- Features delicate flower motif lace and a flattering plunge neckline.
- ​Newly developed three-dimensional resin parts are built into the cups to provide a shaping effect without sacrificing the comfort of a wireless bra.
- The cross component stops the cups from spreading and maintains the contoured form.
- The cross component provides support and upward lift.
- No wires or resin parts at the bottom of the cup.
items.name: WOMEN Wireless Bra (Shape Lift)
items.shortDescription: A comfortable fit with a lifting effect. Creates a natural, flattering outline.

items.composition: Body: 75% Nylon, 25% Spandex/ Cup (Outer Fabric): 100% Polyester
items.longDescription:
- ​New wireless bra with a sense of design and support.
- ​This bra is great for when you want to raise your mood with a gorgeous design and easily support your styles at home.
- Features a delicate and transparent flower motif lace and the trendy plunged neck to flatter your collarbones.
- ​Newly developed three-dimensional resin parts are built into the cups to provide a contoured outline while still being as easy to wear as a wireless bra.
- ​The cross part stops the cups from spreading and keeps the contoured form.
- Supports the bottom of the cup and provides lift to make the décolleté line look charming.
- ​A new type of bra that provides lift like a wire bra for a flattering look.
- ​Excellent design with delicate lace, a trendy plunge neck, and bright colors.
items.name: WOMEN Wireless Bra (Shape Lift)
items.shortDescription: A new bra with a gorgeous design that flatters while still being easy to wear.

items.longDescription:
- Newly updated Ultra Stretch denim has the highest stretch rate ever for stress-free comfort with any kind of movement.
- Jeans that keep their shape even after extended wear.
- Despite being our skinniest-fit jeans, the amazing stretch ensures a comfortable, unrestrictive fit.
- The slightly lower rise and straight waistband create a more streamlined look.
- We’ve adjusted the length of the inseam so that the hem doesn’t bunch up.
- Back pocket size, shape, and placement designed to flatter the figure.
- We’ve updated the finish for a more natural look.
- Dirt-resistant black fabric doesn’t fade in the wash.
items.name: WOMEN Ultra Stretch Jeans
items.shortDescription: Now with even greater stretch. UNIQLO’s skinniest jeans.

items.longDescription:

items.name: WOMEN High Rise Skinny Flare Ankle Jeans
items.shortDescription: Vintage-style jeans that have been carefully designed for a realistic distressed look. An on-trend flare silhouette.

items.longDescription:
- Made with ultra-stretch denim that has an expansion rate of over 55% and recovery rate of over 89%, which is the best stretch in the UNIQLO jeans collection.
- Good kickback, so the knee area doesn't lose shape even after wearing them for a long time.
- Feels smooth against the skin, and despite being a slim and skinny silhouette, they are soft and comfortable when worn.
- Mid-rise with just the right amount of rise and depth, makes it easy to coordinate with.
- We were very particular about the size, shape, and positioning of the back pockets, to make these jeans look even more flattering from behind.
- Used a curve belt at the waist, so that they fit around the hips, and are designed to prevent them from sliding down after a while.
- Conducted study after study to achieve a special processing technology for a black color that does not gather dust.
items.name: WOMEN Extra Stretch Jeans
items.shortDescription: A design with impressive stretch and meticulous attention to detail, giving you both comfort and a beautiful silhouette.

items.longDescription:

- Straight below the knees, so the legs look slicker and more beautiful.

- From our Ines de la Fressange collaboration collection. Synonymous with the timeless appeal of French chic.
- A classic peaked lapel jacket in a slightly longer length.
- Striped sleeve lining.
items.name: WOMEN Wool Blend Jacket
items.shortDescription: A classic jacket in a slightly longer length. In soft yet perfectly crisp fabric.

items.composition: [03] Face: 65% Nylon, 35% Polyester/ Filling: 90% Down, 10% Feathers/ Back: 100% Nylon [Other colors] Face: 100% Nylon/ Filling: 90% Down, 10% Feathers/ Back: 100% Nylon
items.longDescription:
- Redesigned to be static-free thanks to a special lining.
- Pocketable design can be stored in the carrying pouch.
- New longer and thinner silhouette.
- The high collar makes it ideal outerwear, and the shape when you open the zipper is flattering.
- The rounded top of the collar creates a contoured form.
- Seam is aligned with stitches behind the waist to maintain a streamlined look.
- Soft and stretchy tape added to the inside so the cuffs stay rolled up.
- Seam is aligned with stitches behind the waist to maintain a streamlined look.
- The storage pouch comes with a loop that can be hung on the inner left side so you won’t lose it.
items.name: WOMEN Ultra Light Down Jacket
items.shortDescription: The ultra-static fleece provides even more comfort. Thin, light, and warm so it can be used as an innerwear or outerwear.

items.composition: Shell: 70% Cotton, 30% Nylon/ Lining: 65% Polyester, 35% Cotton
items.longDescription:
- The Uniqlo U collection is the realization of a dedicated and skilled team of international designers based at our Paris Research and Development Center led by Artistic Director Christophe Lemaire.
- Cotton-polyester gabardine fabric has a glossy sheen and a distinctive twill texture.
- The functional design creates a military feel.
- Combines classic trench coat details with a double breasted design in a sleek, straight cut.
- Flattering high-waisted belt.
- Classic colors with a distinctive twist.
items.name: WOMEN Double Breasted Trench Coat
items.shortDescription: Elegant cut complements the long length.

items.composition: [07] Face: 65% Nylon, 35% Polyester/ Filling: 90% Down, 10% Feathers/ Back: 100% Nylon [Other colors] Face: 100% Nylon/ Filling: 90% Down, 10% Feathers/ Back: 100% Nylon
items.longDescription:
- Ultra-light, ultra-warm. Our sleek, no-bulk parka.
- Durable water-repellent coating.
- Pocketable design in a compact size for easy carrying.
- Anti-static lining.
- Versatile matte finish.
- Hood stoppers are now inside for a more stylish look.
- Pocketable design can be stored in the carrying pouch.
- Carrying pouch attaches to inside loop on the left.
items.name: WOMEN Ultra Light Down Parka
items.shortDescription: Newly updated with wider quilting for a more casual, puffy look.

items.composition: Shell: 100% Polyester [Filling] Body: 90% Down, 10% Feathers/ Sleeve: 70% Polyester, 30% Viscose/ Hood: 100% Polyester/ Lining: 100% Polyester
items.longDescription:
- Our first collaboration with White Mountaineering explores new possibilities in outerwear and fleece.

- Relaxed cut matches the collaboration’s concept of “the outdoors in everyday life”.
- Features UNIQLO's unique hybrid design.
- The hem adjusts with a spindle cord to create a cocoon silhouette.
- Shape-memory fabric with a subtle glossy sheen.
- Distinctive elegant look and soft feel.
- The same design is also available for kids to easily coordinate outfits with the whole family.
items.name: WOMEN WM Hybrid Down Oversized Parka
items.shortDescription: The cut, design, and textures used to create the concept combine superb function and style. *Purchase Limit : 2 pieces per item per person

items.composition: Shell: 67% Cotton, 33% Polyester/ Lining: 51% Modal, 49% Cotton

- Made with cotton-polyester fabric.
- A fully lined trench coat in a wide cut with minimalistic details.
- Belted, double breasted design.
- An elegant wardrobe staple.
- In classic colors.

items.shortDescription: Our versatile trench coat is a true classic.
